Provides tools for decomposing Global Value Chain (GVC) participation
and value-added trade. It implements the frameworks proposed by Borin
and Mancini (2023) 10.1080/09535314.2022.2153221\> for source-based and
sink-based decompositions, and by Borin, Mancini, and Taglioni (2025)
10.1093/wber/lhaf017\> for tripartite and output-based GVC measures.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`bm_2023_bilateral_pure()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_bilateral_pure.md)
  : BM_2023 pure bilateral decomposition of exports from s to r
- [`bm_2023_bilateral_pure_all()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_bilateral_pure_all.md)
  : BM_2023 pure bilateral (/sr) decomposition for all pairs
- [`bm_2023_bilateral_sink()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_bilateral_sink.md)
  : BM_2023 sink-based bilateral decomposition of exports from s to r
- [`bm_2023_bilateral_sink_all()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_bilateral_sink_all.md)
  : BM_2023 sink-based bilateral decomposition for all pairs
- [`bm_2023_bilateral_source()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_bilateral_source.md)
  : BM_2023 source-based bilateral decomposition of exports from s to r
- [`bm_2023_bilateral_source_all()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_bilateral_source_all.md)
  : BM_2023 source-based bilateral decomposition for all pairs
- [`bm_2023_exporter_total()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_exporter_total.md)
  : BM_2023 exporter-perspective decomposition of total exports of s
- [`bm_2023_exporter_total_all()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2023_exporter_total_all.md)
  : BM_2023 exporter totals for all countries
- [`bm_2025_output_components()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_output_components.md)
  : BM_2025 output-based GVC components by exporter
- [`bm_2025_output_components_sector()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_output_components_sector.md)
  : BM 2025 output components by country and sector
- [`bm_2025_output_measures()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_output_measures.md)
  : BM_2025 output-based GVC participation indicators
- [`bm_2025_output_measures_sector()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_output_measures_sector.md)
  : BM 2025 output participation measures by country and sector
- [`bm_2025_trade_exporter()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_trade_exporter.md)
  : BM_2025 exporter-level GVC trade totals
- [`bm_2025_trade_measures()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_trade_measures.md)
  : BM_2025 trade-based GVC participation indicators
- [`bm_2025_tripartite_trade()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_tripartite_trade.md)
  : BM_2025 tripartite GVC trade decomposition for one pair (s,r)
- [`bm_2025_tripartite_trade_all()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_2025_tripartite_trade_all.md)
  : BM_2025 tripartite GVC trade decomposition for all pairs
- [`bm_build_io()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_build_io.md)
  : Build a bm_io object from IO table blocks
- [`bm_get_e_sr()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_get_e_sr.md)
  : Exports from s to r (sectoral)
- [`bm_get_e_star()`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_get_e_star.md)
  : Total exports of s to all foreign destinations
- [`bm_toy_data`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_toy_data.md)
  [`bm_toy_Z`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_toy_data.md)
  [`bm_toy_Y`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_toy_data.md)
  [`bm_toy_VA`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_toy_data.md)
  [`bm_toy_X`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_toy_data.md)
  [`bm_toy_countries`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_toy_data.md)
  [`bm_toy_sectors`](https://ballavbabu.github.io/gvcAnalyzer/reference/bm_toy_data.md)
  : Toy 4-country, 3-sector IO table for bmGVC
